item.title: Need pi help (easy)
item.dc:creator: @Humblerr Humblerr
item.description:
@Humblerr wrote:

case 50235: case 4140: c.getDH().sendOption4("Dagganoth Kings", "Taverly Dungeon", "Slayer Tower", "Brimhaven Dungeon"); c.teleAction = 1; break;

The problem: i have removed the last option on this teleport, which was island (elf island), so that means it was sendOption5, and ive made it sendOption4 (of course, because theres 4 teleport options now instead of 5) but when i do that, those 4 spells arent clickable anymore, it doesnt teleport you anymore.

Read full topic
